title: Ananda naTamADum ayyan
sahitya:
Ananda naTamADum ayyan tiruvaDi paNivOmE para


anupallavi

  anaittuyirilum vETrumaiyara aghamum puramum niraindu para


caraNam 1    nOi kavalaiyil nondu vembi azhiyum uDalukku azhagEdu
 nAi virumbi veTrelum paikkaDIkkum adu pOl nAmum azhiyAdu para
  caraNam 2    maNDalamEl nAm kaNDa inbamellAm anubhavikka mei valimai uNDO
 viNDalam tavazh ambuliyaip-piDikka malaiyErum maDamai koNDOm para
